Message:
Thanks to the
feelings in my heart,
I gained a new power...

No, it wasn’t just me.
Cerberus did, too...!

Oh yeah...
This was written
in Miss Merlyn’s book—

“When you take the hand of
someone important to you,
your hearts will sing as one,
and cast an ever brighter light.”

Our two lights blended
into a beautiful glow,
binding our two hands together.
Right now, I’m sure we can...!
I then squeezed her hands tightly.

“Cerberus, I won’t let go
of your hands no matter what.
So, it’s going to be okay.
You just need a dash of courage!”

A witch’s power
comes from her caring heart.

The power born
from your heart, Cerberus,
is the kindest magic
in the whole wide world...!

“Yeah...
If you’re here, Big Sis,
I’ll be okay...!”

As we held each other,
we both raised one hand
towards the bubbling pot.

Our blended light
poured into the pot,
illuminating everything
around us in a bright glow.
